00029 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( CSwordModuleInfo* module ) : CSwordKey(module) {
00030   if ( CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module) ) {
00031     key( bible->lowerBound().key() );
00032   }
00033 }

00035 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( const CSwordVerseKey& k ) : VerseKey(k),CSwordKey(k) {
00036 
00037 }

00039 CSwordVerseKey::CSwordVerseKey( const VerseKey* k, CSwordModuleInfo* module) : VerseKey(*k),CSwordKey(module) {
00040 }

00043 CSwordKey* CSwordVerseKey::copy() const {
00044     return new CSwordVerseKey(*this);
00045 }
00046 
00048 CSwordModuleInfo* const CSwordVerseKey::module( CSwordModuleInfo* const newModule ){
00049     if (newModule && (newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || newModule->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) ) {
00050         const QString& oldKey   = key();
00051         m_module = newModule;
00052         key(oldKey);
00053     }
00054     return dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(m_module);
00055 }
00056 
00058 const QString CSwordVerseKey::book( const QString& newBook ) {
00059 //  qWarning("CSwordVerseKey::book( const QString& newBook )");
00060     int min = 0;
00061     int max = 1;
00062     
00063     if (CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module())) {
00064         const bool hasOT = bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::OldTestament);        
00065         const bool hasNT = bible->hasTestament(CSwordBibleModuleInfo::NewTestament);
00066         if (hasOT && hasNT) {
00067             min = 0;
00068             max = 1;
00069         }
00070         else if (hasOT && !hasNT) {
00071             min = 0;
00072             max = 0;
00073         }
00074         else if (!hasOT && hasNT) {
00075             min = 1;
00076             max = 1;
00077         }
00078         else if (!hasOT && !hasNT) {
00079             min = 0;
00080             max = -1; //no loop
00081         }
00082   }
00083 
00084     if (!newBook.isEmpty()) {               
00085         bool finished = false;
00086         for (int testament = min; testament <= max && !finished; ++testament) {
00087             for (int book = 0; book < BMAX[testament] && !finished; ++book) {
00088                 if ( !strcmp((const char*)newBook.local8Bit(),books[testament][book].name ) ) {
00089                     Testament(testament+1);
00090                     Book(book+1);
00091                     finished = true;
00092                 }
00093             }
00094         }
00095     }
00096     if ( Testament() >= min+1 && Testament() <= max+1 && Book() <= BMAX[min] )
00097         return QString::fromLocal8Bit( books[Testament()-1][Book()-1].name );
00098 //  qWarning("return standard book: %s", books[min][0].name);
00099     return QString::fromLocal8Bit( books[min][0].name ); //return the first book, i.e. Genesis
00100 }
00101 
00103 const QString CSwordVerseKey::key(){    
00104     return QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)*this); //don't use fromUtf8 here!
00105 }
00106 
00107 void CSwordVerseKey::key( const QString& newKey ) {
00108     if (newKey.isEmpty()) {
00109     if ( CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module()) ) {
00110       VerseKey::operator = ((const char*)bible->lowerBound().key().local8Bit());
00111     }
00112   }
00113   else
00114     VerseKey::operator = ((const char*)newKey.local8Bit());
00115 }
00116 
00117 void CSwordVerseKey::key( const char* newKey ){
00118   if (newKey && strlen(newKey)>0) {
00119         VerseKey::operator = (newKey);
00120     }
00121   else if (!strlen(newKey)) {
00122     if ( CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module()) ) {
00123       VerseKey::operator = ((const char*)bible->lowerBound().key().local8Bit());
00124     }
00125   }
00126 }
00127 
00128 const bool CSwordVerseKey::next( const JumpType type ) {
00129 //  const QString& oldKey = key();
00130     switch (type) {
00131         case UseBook: {
00132             if (Book() <= 0 || Book() >= BMAX[Testament()-1] && Testament() > 1)
00133                 return false;       
00134             Book(Book()+1);
00135             break;
00136         }
00137         case UseChapter: {
00138             Chapter(Chapter()+1);       
00139             break;
00140         }
00141         case UseVerse: {
00142         if (m_module && m_module->module()) {
00143             m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!    
00144             (*(m_module->module()) )++;
00145             if (!m_module->module()->Error())       
00146                 key( QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText()) );//don't use fromUtf8
00147             else {              
00148               Verse(Verse()+1);
00149               break;
00150             }
00151         }
00152         else
00153           Verse(Verse()+1);
00154         break;
00155         }
00156         default:    
00157             return false;
00158     };
00159 
00160   if ( CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module()) ) {
00161     bool ret = true;
00162     if (_compare(bible->lowerBound()) < 0 ) {
00163       key( bible->lowerBound() );
00164       ret = false;
00165     }
00166     if (_compare(bible->upperBound()) > 0 ) {
00167       key( bible->upperBound() );
00168       ret = false;
00169     }
00170     return ret;
00171   }
00172   return true;
00173 };
00174 
00175 const bool CSwordVerseKey::previous( const JumpType type ) {
00176 //  const QString& oldKey = key();
00177     switch (type) {
00178         case UseBook: {
00179             if (Book()<=1 || Book() > BMAX[Testament()-1] && Testament() > 1)
00180                 return false;
00181             Book(Book()-1);
00182             break;
00183         }
00184         case UseChapter: {
00185             Chapter(Chapter()-1);
00186             break;
00187         }
00188         case UseVerse: {
00189         if (m_module && m_module->module()) {
00190             m_module->module()->SetKey(this);   //use this key as base for the next one!            
00191             ( *( m_module->module() ) )--;
00192             if (!m_module->module()->Error())
00193                 key( QString::fromLocal8Bit(m_module->module()->KeyText()) );//don't use fromUtf8
00194             else
00195               Verse(Verse()-1);
00196         }
00197         else {
00198             Verse(Verse()-1);
00199       }
00200       break;
00201         }
00202         default:    
00203             return false;
00204     };
00205 
00206   if ( CSwordBibleModuleInfo* bible = dynamic_cast<CSwordBibleModuleInfo*>(module()) ) {
00207     qWarning("lower bound: %s", bible->lowerBound().key().latin1());
00208     qWarning("upper bound: %s", bible->upperBound().key().latin1());
00209 
00210     bool ret = true;
00211     if (_compare(bible->lowerBound()) < 0 ) {
00212       key( bible->lowerBound() );
00213       ret = false;
00214     }
00215     if (_compare(bible->upperBound()) > 0 ) {
00216       key( bible->upperBound() );
00217       ret = false;
00218     }
00219     return ret;
00220   }
00221   return true;
00222 };

00225 CSwordVerseKey& CSwordVerseKey::operator = (const QString& keyname){
00226   key(keyname);
00227   return *this;
00228 }
